overview:
Experience in developing, absorbing, learning, gaining, and leading corporate operations to ensure a balanced outcome. A proven leader with lessons learned from 18 + years of high impact deals that spread across public, private and venture backed firms in the high tech industry. This includes a strong track record establishing emerging companies as market leaders, creating new market segments, raising investment capital, driving effective go to market strategies and developing strong partner ecosystems with companies such as EMC, IBM, HP, Dell, Netapp, Microsoft, VMware and Cisco.

I thrive on the understanding that there is always some one smarter to learn from.
